response.overview: After discovering a passenger ship missing since 1962 floating adrift on the Bering Sea, salvagers claim the vessel as their own. Once they begin towing the ghost ship towards harbor, a series of bizarre occurrences happen and the group becomes trapped inside the ship, which they soon learn is inhabited by a demonic creature.
response.title: Ghost Ship

crew.name: Daniel R. Chavez
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production
